getPrivEffective
The function is used for checking whether permissions are available.
Syntax
getPrivEffective
(obj, privilege, user)
Setting
Purpose
obj
System
object type
, for which the permissions are checked
privilege
Defining the
permissions
to be checked
user
selecting a
user
, whose permissions are to be checked
Note
The function is called using the
button, located in the Algorithm Editor on the "Users and groups" tab.
The result of the
function is as follows:
true
– the user has the specified right to the selected object;
false
– the user does not have the specified right to the selected object.
Example
To check the writing permissions for the "Counterparty" object of the "Credit Manager" user, use the following algorithm:
